com.github.i49.hibiscus.facets

Class MaxLengthFacet<V extends JsonValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.i49.hibiscus.facets.MaxLengthFacet<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of JsonValue to which this facet will be applied.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Facet<V>

    public class MaxLengthFacet<V extends JsonValue>
extends Object
implements Facet<V>
    maxLength facet to restrict the value space to the values that have lengths less than or equal to a specific length.

    This facet is applicable to string() or array() type. If the value of the type has the length longer than the expected length, a problem will be reported by this facet. The type of the problem to be reported is determined by LengthProblemFactory which is passed in to the constructor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaxLengthFacet(int maxLength, ToIntFunction<V> lengthMapper, LengthProblemFactory<V> problemFactory)
      Constructs this facet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(V value, List<Problem> problems)
      Applies this facet to a value in JSON document and when the value is out of valid value space, it reports one or more corresponding problems.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaxLengthFacet

        public MaxLengthFacet(int maxLength,
                      ToIntFunction<V> lengthMapper,
                      LengthProblemFactory<V> problemFactory)
        Constructs this facet.
        Parameters:
        maxLength - the maximum length allowed for the type.
        lengthMapper - the mapper used to retrieve the length of the value.
        problemFactory - the factory used to create a new problem when given value has an invalid length.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(V value,
                  List<Problem> problems)
        Description copied from interface: Facet
        Applies this facet to a value in JSON document and when the value is out of valid value space, it reports one or more corresponding problems.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Facet<V extends JsonValue>
        Parameters:
        value - JsonValue in JSON document to be validated.
        problems - the list of problems to which new problems found by this facet will be added.
